mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.app_user (id, username, email, password_hash, nickname, avatar_url, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{nickname}, #{avatarUrl}, #{status, typeHandler=com.avaya.wiki.mybatis.handler.UserStatusTypeHandler})
mapper.select:
SELECT id, username, email, nickname, avatar_url, status FROM public.app_user
nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nickname}, '%')
ORDER BY id
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update:
UPDATE public.app_user
email = #{email},
password_hash = #{passwordHash},
nickname = #{nickname},
avatar_url = #{avatarUrl},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM public.app_user
WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nickname}, '%')
